block_comment: This block assigns the value of the control read data (`E_control_rd_data`). It uses a specific ternary operator statement to determine which register's value to forward based on the value in the `D_iw_control_regnum`. If `D_iw_control_regnum` equals '3d0', '3d1', '3d2', '3d3', '3d4', the corresponding `W_status_reg`, `W_estatus_reg`, `W_bstatus_reg`, `W_ienable_reg`, `W_ipending_reg` is assigned respectively. For any other value, `W_cpuid_reg` is assigned.
